import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Home.css'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useShared } from '../../context/SharedContext'; const Home = () => { const { events, gallery } = useShared(); // Get only upcoming events (events with dates in the future) const upcomingEvents = events .filter(event => new Date(event.date) >= new Date()) .sort((a, b) => new Date(a.date) - new Date(b.date)) .slice(0, 3); // Show only the next 3 upcoming events // Get the first 4 images from the gallery for the front page const frontPageGallery = gallery.slice(0, 4); return (
{/* Featured Section */}

Preserving Edo Culture in Italy

The Edo Cultural Association Italy is dedicated to preserving and promoting the rich cultural heritage of the Edo people in Italy. Through various programs and events, we strive to keep our traditions alive and share them with the wider community.

Join us in celebrating our culture through traditional performances, educational workshops, and community gatherings. Together, we can ensure that the Edo cultural legacy continues to thrive in Italy.

{/* Gallery Section */}

Our Cultural Journey

{frontPageGallery.length > 0 ? ( frontPageGallery.map((item) => ( {item.title} {item.description} )) ) : (

No gallery images available.

)} {frontPageGallery.length > 0 && (

)}

Upcoming Events

{upcomingEvents.length > 0 ? ( upcomingEvents.map((event) => ( {event.image && ( )} {event.title} {new Date(event.date).toLocaleDateString()} {event.time} {event.location} {event.description} Learn More )) ) : (

No upcoming events at this time.

)}

Latest News

{/* News cards will be dynamically added here */}

Photo Gallery

{/* Gallery items will be dynamically added here */}

Our Mission

To promote and preserve Edo cultural heritage in Italy while fostering unity and support among members.

Cultural Events

Join us in celebrating traditional festivals, cultural exhibitions, and community gatherings.

Community Support

Building a strong network of support for Edo people living in Italy.

Message from the President

Welcome to our cultural family. Together, we strive to maintain our rich heritage while embracing our new home in Italy.

- King Luca

Support Our Mission

Help us preserve and promote Edo culture in Italy through your generous support.

Make a Donation

Your financial support helps us organize cultural events and support our community.

Volunteer

Share your time and skills to help organize and run our cultural programs.

Partner with Us

Collaborate with us to promote cultural diversity and community engagement.

Become a Member

Join our growing community and be part of something special.

Join Us Now
); }; export default Home;
